title: ECN Capital Corp. (ECNCF) Q2 2025 Earnings Call Transcript
description: ECN Capital Corp. (OTCPK:ECNCF) Q2 2025 Earnings Conference Call August 7, 2025 5:30 PM ETCompany ParticipantsCody Pearce - Corporate ParticipantJacqueline...
content:
Cody Pearce - Corporate Participant

 Jacqueline J. Weber - Chief Financial Officer

 James Barry - Chief Financial Officer of TRIAD Financial Services

 Katherine Moradiellos - Vice President of Finance and Investor Relations

 Lance Patton Hull - President of Triad Financial Services

 Steven K. Hudson - CEO & Executive Director

Jaeme Gloyn - National Bank Financial, Inc., Research Division

 Stephen Boland - Raymond James Ltd., Research Division

 Tom MacKinnon - BMO Capital Markets Equity Research

Thank you for standing by. This is the conference operator. Welcome to the ECN Capital Second Quarter 2025 Results Conference Call. [Operator Instructions] The conference is being recorded.

[Operator Instructions] I would now like to turn the meeting over to Katherine Moradiellos, Vice President of Finance and Investor Relations. Please go ahead, Katherine.

Thank you, Jen. Good afternoon, everyone, and thank you all for joining this call. Joining us today on the call are Stephen Hudson, Chief Executive Officer of ECN Capital; Jackie Weber, Chief Financial Officer of ECN Capital; Lance Hull, Co-CEO and Vice Chairman of Triad Financial; Cody Pearce, Co-CEO of Triad Financial; and James Barry, Chief Financial Officer of Triad.

A news release summarizing these results was issued this afternoon, and the financial statements and MD&A for the three-month period ended June 30, 2025 have been filed with SEDAR+. These documents are available on our website at www.ecncapitalcorp.com. Presentation slides to be referenced during the call are accessible in the webcast as well as in PDF format under the Presentations section of the company's website.

Before we begin, I want to remind our listeners that some of the information we are sharing with you today includes forward-looking statements. These statements are based
summary: ECN Capital Corp. (ECNCF) has hosted a Q2 2025 Earnings Conference Conference Call, with a news release and the financial statements and MD&A for the three-month period ended June 30, 2025 have been filed with SEDAR+. The company's Vice President of Finance and Investor Relations, Katherine Moradiellos, will present the call. Other participants include Stephen Hudson, Chief Executive Officer of ECN Capital, Jacqueline J. Weber, Chief Financial Officer, Lance Hull, President of Triad Financial Services, Cody Pearce, and James Barry, C Financial Officer of TRIAD Financial Services. The company also includes a list of corporate participants and analysts. The conference call is being recorded.
shortSummary: ECN Capital's Q2 earnings call, featuring CEO Stephen Hudson and CFOs Jacqueline Weber, includes forward-looking statements and slides accessible online.
argos_summary: The ECN Capital Second Quarter 2025 Results Conference Call featured key executives including CEO Steven Hudson and CFO Jacqueline Weber, along with leaders from Triad Financial Services. The call discussed financial results for the period ending June 30, 2025, with supporting documents available on the company's website. Participants were reminded that some information shared may include forward-looking statements.
